name: Prudential plc
membership: Prudential plc is involved in a range of national, European and international organisations, including: Confederation of British Industry, Association of British Insurers, Investment Association, European Fund and Asset Management Association, European Financial Services Roundtable, Chief Finance Officers Forum, Chief Risk Officers Forum, CityUK, British Chamber of Commerce in Belgium, European Services Forum. We also work with Global Counsel as our retained external public policy advisors.
goal: Prudential plc is one of the world’s leading financial services groups, serving 26 million insurance customers, with £657bn of total assets under management (as at 31 December 2018). We meet the long-term savings and protection needs of a growing middle class and ageing population. We focus on three markets – Asia, the US and UK&Europe – where the need for our products is strong and growing and we use our capabilities, footprint and scale to meet that need. In recent years, we have expanded into Africa, taking advantage of the emerging demand for our products in the region.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: In line with business activities, Prudential follows a wide range of policy issues in the areas of insurance, consumer policy, asset management, financial supervision and regulation.
